data.title: Robin Wright
data.meta_description: Robin Wright. Actress: Forrest Gump. Robin Gayle Wright was born in Dallas, Texas, to Gayle (Gaston), a national director at Mary Kay, and Freddie Wright, a pharmaceutical executive. She grew up in San Diego, California. She started her professional career as a model in 1980 at age 14, and worked both in Paris and Japan. After finishing high school she decided to become an actress. She got a role on...
data.text:
She was robbed of her vehicle at gunpoint in Santa Monica, California, in the 1990s. Shortly after the incident, she and Sean Penn moved out of Los Angeles.

Honorary chairperson and national spokesperson for the Gordie Foundation, a nonprofit organization providing today's young people with the skills to navigate the dangers of alcohol, binge drinking, peer pressure, and hazing.

Backed out of the role of Maid Marian in Robin Hood - König der Diebe (1991), with Kevin Costner, upon discovering that she was pregnant with her first child (daughter Dylan Penn).

She has appeared in two films that have been selected for the National Film Registry by the Library of Congress as being "culturally, historically or aesthetically" significant: Die Braut des Prinzen (1987) and Forrest Gump (1994).

Before they married in 1996, Robin and Sean Penn had lived together off and on for 7 years. Both of their children were born before their marriage.

Won the title role in Die Braut des Prinzen (1987) while still under contract to the soap California Clan (1984). In order to get sprung from her soap role temporarily, Wright reluctantly agreed to add nine months to her soap contract.

Had to back out of the role of Abby McDeere in Die Firma (1993), with Tom Cruise, upon discovering that she was pregnant with her second child (son Hopper Penn). The role eventually went to Jeanne Tripplehorn.

Filed for divorce from Sean Penn in December 2007; the couple reconciled in April 2008, and Sean filed for legal separation in April 2009. He withdrew his bid a month later, but the couple filed for divorce in August 2009.

Was formerly engaged to Ben Foster from January 11, 2014 to November 12, 2014. They got back together in January 2015.

In Die Braut des Prinzen (1987), she is credited as 'and introducing' (Robin Wright), although that was not her first film.

One of Time Magazine's 100 Most Influential People in the World. [April 2014].

She is mentioned in the lyrics in the hit song "Palace & Main" by Sweden's biggest rock band, Kent. "Jag skjuter allting framför mig som Robin Wright Penn gör i State of Grace," which translates to "I push everything in front of me like Robin Wright Penn does in Im Vorhof der Hölle (1990).".

Inducted into the Texas Film Hall of Fame on March 7, 2013, in Austin, Texas.

Told More magazine that, although she and Sean Penn withdrew their divorce papers, they are no longer together. (August 2009)
